data.title: Bureau of Cannabis Control Announces Opening of North Coast Regional Office
data.excerpt: SACRAMENTO – The Bureau of Cannabis Control (BCC) today announced the upcoming opening of its North Coast Regional Office in Eureka.
data.author: Department of Cannabis Control
tags: CA Department of Food and Agriculture
